00043 //
00044 // internal: gateId bitfield macros.
00045 // See note in cgate.cc
00046 //
00047 #define GATEID_LBITS  20
00048 #define GATEID_HBITS  (8*sizeof(int)-GATEID_LBITS)   // usually 12
00049 #define GATEID_HMASK  ((~0)<<GATEID_LBITS)           // usually 0xFFF00000
00050 #define GATEID_LMASK  (~GATEID_HMASK)                // usually 0x000FFFFF
00051 
00052 #define MAX_VECTORGATES  ((1<<(GATEID_HBITS-1))-2)   // usually 2046
00053 #define MAX_SCALARGATES  ((1<<(GATEID_LBITS-1))-2)   // usually ~500000
00054 #define MAX_VECTORGATESIZE ((1<<(GATEID_LBITS-1))-1) // usually ~500000
00055 
00064 class SIM_API cGate : public cObject, noncopyable
00065 {
00066     friend class cModule;
00067     friend class cModuleGates;
00068     friend class cPlaceholderModule;
00069 
00070   public:
00074     enum Type {
00075         NONE = 0,
00076         INPUT = 'I',
00077         OUTPUT = 'O',
00078         INOUT = 'B'
00079     };
00080 
00081   protected:
00082     // internal
00083     struct SIM_API Name
00084     {
00085         opp_string name;  // "foo"
00086         opp_string namei; // "foo$i"
00087         opp_string nameo; // "foo$o"
00088         Type type;
00089         Name(const char *name, Type type);
00090         bool operator<(const Name& other) const;
00091     };
00092 
00093   public:
00094     // Internal data structure, only public for technical reasons (GateIterator).
00095     // One instance per module and per gate vector/gate pair/gate.
00096     // Note: gate name and type are factored out to a global pool.
00097     // Note2: to reduce sizeof(Desc), "size" might be stored in inputgatev[0],
00098     // although it might not be worthwhile the extra complication and CPU cycles.
00099     //
00100     struct Desc
00101     {
00102         cModule *ownerp;
00103         Name *namep;  // pooled (points into cModule::namePool)
00104         int size; // gate vector size, or -1 if scalar gate; actually allocated size is capacityFor(size)
00105         union { cGate *inputgate; cGate **inputgatev; };
00106         union { cGate *outputgate; cGate **outputgatev; };
00107 
00108         Desc() {ownerp=NULL; size=-1; namep=NULL; inputgate=outputgate=NULL;}
00109         bool inUse() const {return namep!=NULL;}
00110         Type getType() const {return namep->type;}
00111         bool isVector() const {return size>=0;}
00112         const char *nameFor(Type t) const {return (t==INOUT||namep->type!=INOUT) ? namep->name.c_str() : t==INPUT ? namep->namei.c_str() : namep->nameo.c_str();}
00113         int indexOf(const cGate *g) const {return (g->pos>>2)==-1 ? 0 : g->pos>>2;}
00114         bool deliverOnReceptionStart(const cGate *g) const {return g->pos&2;}
00115         Type getTypeOf(const cGate *g) const {return (g->pos&1)==0 ? INPUT : OUTPUT;}
00116         bool isInput(const cGate *g) const {return (g->pos&1)==0;}
00117         bool isOutput(const cGate *g) const {return (g->pos&1)==1;}
00118         int gateSize() const {return size>=0 ? size : 1;}
00119         void setInputGate(cGate *g) {ASSERT(getType()!=OUTPUT && !isVector()); inputgate=g; g->desc=this; g->pos=(-1<<2);}
00120         void setOutputGate(cGate *g) {ASSERT(getType()!=INPUT && !isVector()); outputgate=g; g->desc=this; g->pos=(-1<<2)|1;}
00121         void setInputGate(cGate *g, int index) {ASSERT(getType()!=OUTPUT && isVector()); inputgatev[index]=g; g->desc=this; g->pos=(index<<2);}
00122         void setOutputGate(cGate *g, int index) {ASSERT(getType()!=INPUT && isVector()); outputgatev[index]=g; g->desc=this; g->pos=(index<<2)|1;}
00123         static int capacityFor(int size) {return size<8 ? (size+1)&~1 : size<32 ? (size+3)&~3 : size<256 ? (size+15)&~15 : (size+63)&~63;}
00124     };
00125 
00126   protected:
00127     Desc *desc; // descriptor of gate/gate vector, stored in cModule
00128     int pos;    // b0: input(0) or output(1); b1: deliverOnReceptionStart bit;
00129                 // rest (pos>>2): array index, or -1 if scalar gate
00130 
00131     cChannel *channelp; // channel object (if exists)
00132     cGate *prevgatep;   // previous and next gate in the path
00133     cGate *nextgatep;
00134 
00135   protected:
00136     // internal: constructor is protected because only cModule is allowed to create instances
00137     explicit cGate();
00138 
00139     // also protected: only cModule is allowed to delete gates
00140     virtual ~cGate();
00141 
00142     // internal
00143     static void clearFullnamePool();
00144 
00145     // internal
00146     void installChannel(cChannel *chan);
00147 
00148     // internal
00149     void checkChannels() const;
00150 
00151   public:
00157     virtual const char *getName() const;
00158 
00164     virtual const char *getFullName() const;
00165 
00170     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00171 
00176     virtual std::string info() const;
00177 
00181     virtual cObject *getOwner() const;
00183 
00191     virtual bool deliver(cMessage *msg, simtime_t at);
00192 
00215     cChannel *connectTo(cGate *gate, cChannel *channel=NULL, bool leaveUninitialized=false);
00216 
00224     void disconnect();
00225 
00232     cChannel *reconnectWith(cChannel *channel, bool leaveUninitialized=false);
00233 
00237     _OPPDEPRECATED void setChannel(cChannel *channel) {reconnectWith(channel);}
00239 
00245     const char *getBaseName() const;
00246 
00250     const char *getNameSuffix() const;
00251 
00256     cProperties *getProperties() const;
00257 
00263     Type getType() const  {return desc->getTypeOf(this);}
00264 
00268     static const char *getTypeName(Type t);
00269 
00273     cModule *getOwnerModule() const;
00274 
00288     int getId() const;
00289 
00293     bool isVector() const  {return desc->isVector();}
00294 
00299     int getIndex() const  {return desc->indexOf(this);}
00300 
00307     int getVectorSize() const  {return desc->gateSize();}
00308 
00312     int size() const  {return getVectorSize();}
00313 
00319     cChannel *getChannel() const  {return channelp;}
00320 
00331     void setDeliverOnReceptionStart(bool d);
00332 
00340     bool getDeliverOnReceptionStart() const  {return pos&2;}
00342 
00363     cChannel *getTransmissionChannel() const;
00364 
00369     cChannel *findTransmissionChannel() const;
00370 
00379     cChannel *getIncomingTransmissionChannel() const;
00380 
00386     cChannel *findIncomingTransmissionChannel() const;
00388

00397     cGate *getPreviousGate() const {return prevgatep;}
00398 
00404     cGate *getNextGate() const   {return nextgatep;}
00405 
00410     cGate *getPathStartGate() const;
00411 
00416     cGate *getPathEndGate() const;
00417 
00421     bool pathContains(cModule *module, int gateId=-1);
00422

00431 
00439     bool isConnectedInside() const;
00440 
00446     bool isConnected() const;
00447

00454 
00463     cDisplayString& getDisplayString();
00464 
00468     void setDisplayString(const char *dispstr);
00470 };
